title: Ep 171: Ask a Cosmetic Chemist: Ron Robinson
itunes:title: Ep 171: Ask a Cosmetic Chemist: Ron Robinson
itunes:subtitle: Cosmetic chemist and founder of BeautyStat Ron Robinson answers your biggest questions about all things ingredients, from clean beauty to essential oils and where to find unbiased product info online. This is a must-listen for anyone who is serious abo...
description:
Cosmetic chemist and founder of BeautyStat Ron Robinson answers your biggest questions about all things ingredients, from clean beauty to essential oils and where to find unbiased product info online. This is a must-listen for anyone who is serious about skincare! Before that: We discuss our SPF pet peeve and the pros and cons of dermaplaning. 


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com 

Website: fatmascara.com
